#text=There are times when I need to get somewhere without using my car or without using the tube .
#text=For these times I use Transport for London 's public bus system .
#text=I wanted to go from my flat to the bumping club in Shoreditch .
#text=Unfortunately it was past midnight and the tubes were closed .
#text=I decided upon taking a bus instead of taking a minicab or a taxi .
#text=I found the bus stop and waited patiently for the correct bus .
#text=Stepping on I tapped in and greeted the driver .
#text=He seemed very nice , as did the people on the bus .
#text=It was filled with many other revelers who were in similar states of intoxication .
#text=We rode towards our destination , a popular club , in unison .
#text=I met a pretty girl who I talked with at length .
#text=We decided we were going to dance together at the club !
#text=All in all it was an exciting and enjoyable ride on a London double decker bus !
